author: Lee Temples
comment: App not working well on S7. When you hit record they're is about a 7 second delay before it actually starts recording. Not good in a game situation when you are trying to get video of a swing etc

author: Jerad Baletka
comment: Imported video, trimmed video saved as new file , & I'm still not open
title: Won't open videos

author: ruben sendejo
comment: Tool
title: Easiest app for breaking down pitching and hitting!

author: Michael OShea
comment: Update: after the update it now tells me my free version has expired! After I paid for an in app purchase. Stay away from this app. Stay far away! Poor interface including references to a golf app that this must be based on. Expect more than this. Does not deliver on in app purchases either. I paid for 3 models and it only lets me download one.

reply.author: V1 Sports
reply.content: Hi Michael,  Sorry to hear the app isn't behaving.  We want to help, please confirm that you have unlocker installed on your Galaxy Note II and that the latest update has been applied.  For additional tech suport, please email support@ifrontiers.com

title: Clunky and poorly designed and a rip off too

author: Stan S.
comment: Great tool for little league coaches to show their players What they do and what you want instead.
title: Great baseball coach training aid

author: Just A Regular Citizen and Community Member
comment: Great tool to help my little league team!
title: Love it!

author: Coach Swanny
comment: Have used this for years from our travel baseball clubs.  It is a great way to see what the best in baseball do for hitting and pitching mechanics.
title: Best instructor tool

author: John Novinsky
comment: After the recent updates, this app has turned to crap and has embarrassed myself and my staff that all use, soon to be past tense, this app. Way to come out with a great product and then kill it with unusable updates.
title: Updates make apps better👎

author: Rico Rivera
comment: After the update all of my saved and imported videos are not accessible.  Please help! I can't access any of my videos except the ones that are from RVP.  I used to use this app on a weekly basis for analysis.  But I can't anymore. Please fix it.  I need my videos back!!
title: New update deleted all videos

comment: Does not work properly lost many videos and can not get tech support

comment: Works amazing
title: Best app

comment: great app and great support team

author: Robert Winger
comment: Like others have stated, crashes everyone I click 'analyze'.  Not much value at this point.
title: Analyze = crash

author: Scott Garcia
comment: Used to work for about two months then crashes every time I load a player to analyze. Go back to the drawing board this app sucks.

author: Jon Chase
comment: This app use to work, it no longer works at all for analyzing video, preview, change labels description, capturing video, etc.  It stops.  Please fix!
title: No longer works

author: Jeremy Hill
comment: Crashes every time I try to analyze a stored video!
title: Crap

author: Bruce Bond
comment: Good app, but model videos are years old and unpredictable what you will get. You might get three different videos of one player, then just one video of another. No way to know until you buy the model videos. Solid app but models are disappointing.
title: Out of date

author: Ryan Horsley
comment: Loved it

comment: Cannot capture. Crashes when trying to analyze imported videos.
title: Doesn't work at all

comment: Needs chromecast capabilities

comment: Video is not uploading!

comment: Why does this app need GPS access? The last update is causing high usage on my Galaxy Note 3

comment: Use to work until last update, tells me to use phones video camera when I try to capture and that still does not work. Also says something about memory usage. Wish I could go back to old version.

author: Brian Hawkins
comment: Works so great, many features like drawing shapes, mirroring images to switch a lefty to a righty, drawing angles, and a lot more. So many different viewpoints too!
title: Great way to get examples from the greats

author: Patrick LaJuett
comment: Side by side view combined with simple drawing tools is a great way to measure progress on improving swing mechanics.
title: Great app for analyzing baseball swing.

comment: Pretty Good
title: Gene

author: Tim Sterling
comment: Updated to latest software and now I can, 'T get the app to trim any, in fact it locks up and freaks out saying I need to rotate my screen,  this needs to get fixed asap.  I am in the middle of baseball season and use this app as a training aid against previous vids I have taken on here, so I need it to work.  I already paid once for pro why do I need to buy in again?  Help

reply.author: V1 Sports
reply.content: Hi Tim, Sorry to hear the app isn't behaving. We want to help, please confirm that you have that the latest update from the Google Play Store. For additional tech suport, please email support@ifrontiers.com
